description: This file defines a mock class for the SecureStorageService, which is used for testing purposes in a gRPC-based secure storage system. It includes mock methods for service operations like GetValue, UpdateValue, DeleteValue, DeleteAllValues, and SeedValue.

classes.name: SecureStorageServiceMock
classes.description: A mock class for the SecureStorageService gRPC service, used for testing handlers and clients by simulating service behavior.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mock method for retrieving a value from secure storage.

methods.name: UpdateValue
methods.description: Mock method for updating a value in secure storage.

methods.name: DeleteValue
methods.description: Mock method for deleting a specific value from secure storage.

methods.name: DeleteAllValues
methods.description: Mock method for deleting all values from secure storage.

methods.name: SeedValue
methods.description: Mock method for seeding or initializing values in secure storage.
